name: Ice
description: Valyrian steel greatsword and an heirloom of House Stark, who had wielded it for generations. It was used both in war and on ceremonial occasions by the Lord of Winterfell.

name: Dawn
description: The ancestral sword of House Dayne. The sword's bearer is a knight of the family, who bears the title of the Sword of the Morning

name: Needle
description: Needle is a thin sword wielded by Arya Stark. It was given to her by Jon Snow, who had it made by Mikken, the blacksmith of Winterfell.

name: Widow's Wail
description: Widow's Wail is the second Valyrian steel blade made from Ice, the blade of House Stark.

name: Forrester greatsword
description: The Forrester greatsword is a weapon passed down through the Lords of House Forrester. It is incredibly valuable and coveted.

name: Wildfire
description: Wildfire is a dangerous liquid which is created and controlled by the Alchemists' Guild, an ancient society of learned men boasting arcane knowledge now based in the city of King's Landing

name: Dragonglass
description: Dragonglass is a common name in Westeros for the substance known as obsidian, a form of volcanic glass. Along with Valyrian steel, it is one of the two known substances capable of killing White Walkers.

name: Arakh
description: The arakh is the standard weapon used by Dothraki warriors.

name: Manticore
description: Manticores are highly aggressive and extremely venomous scorpion-like insects from the continent of Essos.

name: Fury
description: The Fury is the flagship of Stannis Baratheon's fleet.

name: Black Betha
description: The Black Betha is a ship captained by Ser Davos Seaworth. Its first mate is Matthos Seaworth, Ser Davos's son.

name: The Hound's helm
description: One of the most vicious warriors in Westeros and former bodyguard to King Joffrey, the Hound abandoned his master and is currently at large in the Riverlands.

name: Loras Tyrell's helm
description: The handsome young Ser Loras was the secret lover of Renly Baratheon, for whom he served as Kingsguard. After Renly’s murder, Loras was persuaded to side with the Lannisters and helped them defend King’s Landing

name: Horse
description: Horses are four-legged mammals which have been domesticated throughout the Known World for use as beasts of burden, mounts in war, or simply for transportation.

name: Direwolf
description: Direwolves are an unusually large and intelligent species of wolf. A grey direwolf on a white field is the sigil of House Stark.

name: Dragon
description: Dragons are massive, flying reptiles which can breathe fire onto their enemies, rumored to have a strong connection to magic, later 'proven' true when magic begins to return to the world after the birth of the first three in over two hundred years.
